name: @modelcontextprotocol/server-sequential-thinking
description: MCP server for sequential thinking and problem solving
author: Anthropic, PBC (https://anthropic.com)

scripts.build: tsc && shx chmod +x dist/*.js && shx cp -r public dist/ && shx mkdir -p dist/public/vendor/vis-network && shx cp ../../node_modules/vis-network/dist/dist/vis-network.min.css dist/public/vendor/vis-network/ && shx cp ../../node_modules/vis-network/dist/vis-network.min.js dist/public/vendor/vis-network/
